sources.title: Winter of '54: Father Pierre (1989) Lambert Wilson, Claudia Cardinale | 4K French film
sources.description:
France experienced one of the most chilling winters in 1954.It was during that harsh weather that a catholic priest Father Pierre wrote an open letter to minister of housing to provide shelter to numerous homeless people.
